content: the arctic ice beanie is a quick and easy crochet project this pattern is wonderful for crochet beginners as the adult beanie takes an hour to make or less than that for experienced crocheters the stitches are worked in row to create a knit-look crochet beanie you can top your beanie with a large wool pom pom as pictured but you can easily use a faux fur pom pom or leave off the pomp om entirely whatever floats your boat arctic ice beanie is the perfect winter crochet beanie and the fast crocheting time means you can make it in many different colours this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes child teen adult women adult men skill level beginner check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
